enabled.title: Enable Play Midnight
enabled.description: This will temporarily disable/enable Play Midnight if you don't want it on all the time

accentsOnly.title: Enable Light-Mode Accents
accentsOnly.description: This enables custom accents when Play Midnight is disabled

accents.title: Accent Colors
accents.description: Customize the accent color to your heart"s content
accents.note: Currently accepts colors in hex/rgb format (#XXX, #XXXXXX, rgb(X,X,X))

favicon.title: Show Play Midnight Favicon
favicon.description: This is the icon that shows on your Google Play tab in the browser

faviconAccent.title: Show Accent Favicon
faviconAccent.description: Makes the favicon match your selected accent color instead of dark

fab.title: Show Play Midnight Fab Icon
fab.description: Enable the FAB (bottom right) icon for quick access to Play Midnight settings

topbar.title: Enable Dark Top Bar
topbar.description: Makes the top search bar dark instead of accent color

queue.title: Enable Larger Queue
queue.description: Makes the now playing queue span across your screen further to prevent cutting off song titles

largeTable.title: Enable Larger Song Table
largeTable.description: Makes the heights of the song rows larger like the were originally before the December 15th change

sidebar.title: Enable Static Sidebar
sidebar.description: Show sidebar on page load and keep it open permanently

staticPlaylists.title: Enable Static Playlists
staticPlaylists.description: Show playlists sidebar on page load and keep it open permanently

artistImage.title: Remove Artist Header Image
artistImage.description: This hides the background image on artist pages

listenNow.title: Listen Now
listenNow.description: The default central hub for Play Music

topCharts.title: Top Charts
topCharts.description: Top songs and albums currently trending in Play Music

recent.title: Recent Activity
recent.description: Access to your most recently played and added music

newReleases.title: New Releases
newReleases.description: Newest albums and singles added to Play Music

myLibrary.title: My Library
myLibrary.description: The home of your wonderful music collection

podcasts.title: Podcasts
podcasts.description: Podcasts brought directly to you from Google

browseStations.title: Browse Stations
browseStations.description: Radio stations brought directly to you from Google

lastAdded.title: Last Added
lastAdded.description: All of your most recently added music

freePurchased.title: Free and Purchased
freePurchased.description: The music you've paid for or collected over time

notify.title: Update Notifications
notify.description: Show Play Midnight update notifications when new features are introduced

verbose.title: Play Midnight VERBOSE Mode
verbose.description: Enables verbose mode, logging all the fun developer notes to the console to see what Play Midnight is up to

thanks.description:
Why hello! Just wanted to take another minute to thank all of you for checking out Play Midnight. This project has been something that has grown with me over time and I can't begin to express how much I've enjoyed hearing from all of you. There have been and will be bugs, and I appreciate that you guys have been kind enough not to tear me apart while I fix them, haha. I've poured as much of myself into this as I can and I hope that you enjoy it as much as I do.

Again, if you notice any issues, or have any suggestions don't hesitate to shoot that over to me. The best place to reach me is through the subreddit at /r/PlayMidnight or through email. If you'd like to shoot me a donation or buy me some coffee, you can do so via PayPal or Bitcoin. Once again, thanks again for all the feedback and I hope you enjoy Play Midnight, peace!
